Actions.ActionName: Verify and/or set DND__kmfamResourcesFolderPath, loop until valid or canceled

Actions.Title: KM Favorite Actions and Macros
Actions.ActionName: Tell the user we need them to locate the Resources Folder for us.
Actions.Prompt: You need to specify the location of the Resources Folder "KMFAM Resources".Please click "OK", and locate the Resources Folder.

Actions.ActionName: Have the user pick the Resources Folder
Actions.Text: tell application (path to frontmost application as text)	set dir to POSIX path of (choose folder with prompt "Please locate the folder 'KMFAM Resources'")end tell
